title: Role of herbal medicine in boosting immune system
author: Samaneh Khodadadi
description: Treatment with herbal drugs discuss to using a plant's seeds, berries, roots, leaves, bark and flowers due to therapeutic reasons. Using of drugs with herbal origin has a prolonged history of use, outside of conventional medicine. The use of herbal supplements has increased dramatically over the past 30 years.
